mapper.sql: id, project_id, title, content, score, only_yn, actor_role_id, adder_role_id, approved_role_id, add_id, add_time, begin_date, end_date, valid_yn, score_get_method_cd ,(select p.project_name from p_score_project p where p.id = p_score_detail.project_id) as project_name
